name: Optimize Imports on Save
description: Clean up and optimize imports in React/TypeScript files

actions.prompt:
The file that was just saved may have unused imports or could benefit from import optimization. Please:
1. Review the imports in the modified file
2. Remove any unused imports
3. Organize imports by grouping (React imports, third-party libraries, local imports)
4. Ensure all imports are properly typed
5. Check for any missing imports that might be needed
